description:
Persons covered aged 16 years and over

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
63400 EU statistics on income and living conditions

Definition:
All household members who were aged 16 years or over on 31
December of the year preceding the survey. Only these
persons were actually questioned in the survey (individual
questionnaire).


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2016
name: Persons covered aged 16 years and over
